column3: 13 Add-Add 1 tablespoon honey to the bowl
6 Add-Add 1 teaspoon cornstarch to the bowl
2 Add-Add 1/8 teaspoon black pepper to the bowl
7 Peel-Peel 2 cloves of garlic
9 mince-mince garlic
3 Add-Add 1/8 cup soy sauce to the bowl
4 Take-Take 2 cremini mushrooms
8 Add-Add 1/2 tablespoon minced ginger to the bowl
5 Add-Add 1/6 cup water the bowl
1 Take-Take 5 in number broccoli florets
11 Add-Add 2 cloves minced garlic to the bowl
10 Take-Take 1 bell pepper
16 slice-slice 1/3 of the bell pepper
14 Whisk-Whisk the contents of bowl
12 slice-slice mushrooms
17 Heat-Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
19 Add-Add broccoli to the skillet
18 Add-add sliced mushrooms to the skillet
20 cook-cook, stirring often, for 4 minutes. If the pan gets too hot on medium-high, turn the heat down to medium
21 Add-Add bell pepper to the skillet
22 continue cooking-continue cooking, stirring often, for 2-3 minutes, until vegetables are crisp-tender
23 Whisk-Whisk the sauce again to recombine the ingredients
24 Pour-Pour the sauce into the skillet
25 cook-cook, stirring, for 1 minute until the sauce thickens
